bibl.title: The Title pater (tes) poleos and the Papyri.
bibl.note: Three papyri prove that curator civitatis = logistes does not equal pater tes poleos: P. Mich. Inv. 3780 [ed. pr.: P.J. Sijpesteijn, ZPE 62 (1986) pp. 133-137], P. Oxy. XXXVI, 2780, and P. Vars. 30 (= S.B. XII, 11079).
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, The Title pater (tes) poleos and the Papyri.

Three papyri prove that curator civitatis = logistes does not equal pater tes poleos: P. Mich. Inv. 3780 [ed. pr.: P.J. Sijpesteijn, ZPE 62 (1986) pp. 133-137], P. Oxy. XXXVI, 2780, and P. Vars. 30 (= S.B. XII, 11079).
